resources.string: Thanks for downloading clafrica mobile. To use this keyboard, follow the instructions below:

Thanks for downloading the Clafrica Mobile Keyboard. To use this keyboard, you need to activate it. Clicking on the button below, then click on the toggle button next to Clafrica Mobile on the page that shows up to activate it.
Once you have activated the Clafrica keyboard, click on the button below then select Clafrica Mobile in the menu that shows up.
